# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-105">本文列出了所有敏感信息类型实体定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-105">This article lists all sensitive information type entity definitions.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-106">每个定义都显示 DLP 策略查找以检测每种类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-106">Each definition shows what a DLP policy looks for to detect each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-107">若要了解有关敏感信息类型的信息，请参阅 [敏感信息类型](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-108">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-109">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-110">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-112">00-12、21-32、61-72 或 80 之间的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-113">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-114">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-115">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-116">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-117">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-119">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-121">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-122">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-123">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-124">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-143">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-144">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-145">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-146">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-147">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-148">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-149">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-150">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-151">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-152">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-153">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-154">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-155">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-156">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-157">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-158">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-164">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-170">阿根廷唯一税务识别密钥 (CUIT/CUIL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-171">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-172">11 个数字（带短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-174">带破折号的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-175">20、23、24、27、30、33 或 34 中的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-176">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-177">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-178">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-179">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-181">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-183">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-184">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-185">找到 的 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-187">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-226">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-227">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-228">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的 6 到 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-230">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-231">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-232">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-233">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-234">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-235">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-236">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-237">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-238">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-239">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-240">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-241">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-242">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-243">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-244">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-260">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-261">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-267">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-268">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-270">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-271">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-272">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-273">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-274">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-275">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-276">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-277">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-279">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-281">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-282">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-283">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-284">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-285">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-295">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-296">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-297">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-298">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-299">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-300">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-301">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-302">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-303">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-305">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-306">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-307">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-308">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-309">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-310">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-311">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-312">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-313">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-315">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-316">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-317">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-318">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-324">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-324">australia company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-328">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-329">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-330">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-332">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-333">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-334">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-335">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-336">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-337">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-338">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-339">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-340">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-342">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-345">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-346">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-347">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-447">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-448">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-449">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-450">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-451">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-452">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-453">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-454">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-455">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-457">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-459">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-460">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-461">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-463">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-463">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-464">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-474">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-475">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-476">八个或九个字母数字字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-478">一个字母 (N、E、D、F、A、C、U、X) 后跟七个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-479">两个字母 (PA、PB、PC、PD、PE、PF、PU、PW、PX、PZ) 后跟七个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-481">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-483">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-484">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-485">找到 的 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-486">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-487">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-507">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-508">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-509">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-511">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-512">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-513">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-514">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-515">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-516">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-518">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-520">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-521">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-522">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-535">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-536">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-537">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-539">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-541">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-543">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-544">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-545">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-672">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-673">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-674">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-675">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-676">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-677">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-678">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-679">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-680">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-681">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-682">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="753ae-683">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-684">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-686">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-688">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-689">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-690">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-691">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-693">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-695">personalaus一sich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-696">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-697">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-698">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-700">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-701">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-702">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-703">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-705">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-708">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-709">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-710">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-712">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-713">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-737">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-738">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-739">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-741">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-742">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-743">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-744">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-746">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-749">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-750">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-752">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-778">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-779">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-780">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-782">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-783">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-784">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-785">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-786">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-787">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-789">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-792">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-793">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-794">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-795">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-818">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-819">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-820">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-821">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-822">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-823">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-824">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-825">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-826">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-828">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-829">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-830">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-831">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-832">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-833">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-834">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-835">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-836">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-837">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-838">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-840">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-842">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-843">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-844">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-845">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-846">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-864">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-865">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-866">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-867">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-868">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-869">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-870">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-871">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-872">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-874">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-876">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-877">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-878">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-893">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-894">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-895">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-896">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-897">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-898">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-899">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-900">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-901">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-902">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-903">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-904">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-905">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-906">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-907">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-909">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-910">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-911">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-912">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-913">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-914">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-915">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-917">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-919">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-920">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-921">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-924"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-924">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-925">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-925">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-926">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-926">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-927">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-927">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-928">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-928">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-929">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-929">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-930">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-930">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-931">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-931">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-932">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-932">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-933">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-933">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-934">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-934">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-935">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-935">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-936">Azure IoT连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-937">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-938">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-939">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-941">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-942">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-943">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-944">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-945">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-946">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="753ae-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-948">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-949">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-950">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-951">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-952">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-953">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-954">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-955">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-956">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-957">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-958">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-959">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-960">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
