## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2057">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2058">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2059">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2061">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2063">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2065">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2066">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2067">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2100">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2101">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2102">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2104">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2105">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2105">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2106">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2107">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2108">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2109">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2110">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2111">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2112">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2113">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2114">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2115">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2116">至少以下两种模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2117">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2118">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2119">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2120">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2121">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2122">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2123">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2124">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2143">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2143">driver's licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2144">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2144">drivers licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2145">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2145">DOB</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2147">Birthday</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2147">Birthday</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2148">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2148">Date of Birth</span></span> 

   
## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2149">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2150">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2151">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2153">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2154">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2154">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2155">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2155">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2156">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2157">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2159">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2159">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2160">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2161">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2162">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2163">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2164">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2165">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2166">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2168">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2169">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2170">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2207">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2208">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2209">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2210">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2211">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2212">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2213">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2214">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2215">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2217">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2220">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2221">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2222">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2223">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2224">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2225">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2226">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2226">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2227">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2228">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2228">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2229">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2229">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2230">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2230">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2231">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2231">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2232">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2232">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2233">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2233">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2234">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2234">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2235">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2235">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2236">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2236">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2237">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2237">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2238">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2239">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2240">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2242">检测来自全球所有主要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2244">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2246">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2247">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2248">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2249">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2250">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2251">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2253">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2254">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2255">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2515">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2516">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2517">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2518">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2519">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2519">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2521">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2521">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2523">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2524">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2525">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2649">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2650">此实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2651">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2652">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2653">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2654">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2655">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2657">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2659">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2660">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2661">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2692">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2693">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2694">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2696">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2696">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2698">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2700">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2701">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2702">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2703">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2705">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2706">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2724">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2725">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2726">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2728">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2729">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2729">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2730">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2732">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2735">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2736">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2737">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2738">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2739">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2740">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2771">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2772">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2773">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2774">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2775">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2775">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2776">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2777">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2778">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2779">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2780">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2781">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2782">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2782">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2783">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2783">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2784">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2784">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2785">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2785">driverlics</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2904">αριθμό άδειας οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2904">αριθμό άδειας οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2905">άδειες οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2905">άδειες οδήγησης</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2906">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2907">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2908">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2909">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2910">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2911">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2912">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2913">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2914">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2915">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2916">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2916">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2917">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2918">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2918">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2919">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2920">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2921">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2922">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2931">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2932">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2933">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2935">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2937">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2939">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2940">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2941">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2942">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2943">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2944">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2945">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2974">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2975">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2976">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2977">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2978">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2979">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2980">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2981">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2982">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2983">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2984">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2985">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2986">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2987">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2988">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2989">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2989">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-2990">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2991">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2992">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2993">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-2994">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-2995">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3023">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3024">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3025">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3027">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3028">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3029">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3030">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3031">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3032">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3033">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3033">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3034">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3035">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3036">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3037">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3163">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3164">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3165">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3166">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3167">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3168">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3169">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3169">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3170">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3171">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3172">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3173">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3174">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3175">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3176">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3177">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3199">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3200">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3201">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3203">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3204">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3205">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3206">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3207">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3208">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3209">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3210">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3212">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3214">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3215">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3216">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3218">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3219">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3267">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3268">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3269">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3271">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3271">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3273">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3275">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3276">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3277">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3278">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3278">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3401">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3402">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3403">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3405">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3405">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3407">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3407">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3409">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3410">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3411">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3412">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3413">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3414">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3415">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3435">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3436">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3437">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3438">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3439">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3440">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3441">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3441">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3442">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3444">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3446">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3447">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3448">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3449">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3450">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3451">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3452">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3524">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3525">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3526">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3527">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3528">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3529">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3530">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3531">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3532">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3533">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3534">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3535">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3536">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3537">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3538">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3539">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3540">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3541">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3542">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3544">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3545">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3545">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3546">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3546">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3547">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3547">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3548">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3549">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3550">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3551">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3552">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3553">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3554">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3554">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3556">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3556">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3558">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3559">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3560">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
