## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3686">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3687">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3688">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3689">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3690">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3691">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3692">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3693">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3694">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3695">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3696">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3696">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3697">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3698">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3699">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3700">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3700">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3702">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3705">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3706">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3708">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3741">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3742">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3743">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3744">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3745">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3746">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3747">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3748">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3749">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3750">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3751">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3752">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3753">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3754">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3755">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3773">欧盟借记卡号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3774">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3775">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3777">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3778">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3779">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-3780">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-3781">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3782">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3783">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3784">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3785">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3786">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3787">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3788">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-3789">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4236">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4237">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4238">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4240">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4241">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4241">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4242">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4243">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4243">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4244">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4246">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4246">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4249">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4250">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4381">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4382">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4383">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4384">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4385">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4386">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4387">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4388">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4389">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4391">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4392">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4393">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4394">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4395">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4396">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4397">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4398">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4399">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4400">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4418">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4419">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4420">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4421">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4422">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4423">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4424">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4425">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4426">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4427">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4428">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4429">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4430">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4431">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4432">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4433">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4434">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4435">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4436">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4437">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4437">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4438">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4438">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4439">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4439">henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4485">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4486">此实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4487">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4488">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4489">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4490">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4491">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4492">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4493">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4494">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4495">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4496">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4497">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4498">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4499">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4500">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4501">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4502">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4515">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4515">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4521">passi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4521">passi#</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4526">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4527">此实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4528">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4529">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4530">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4531">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4532">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4533">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4534">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4535">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4536">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4537">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4664">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4664">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4665">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4665">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4666">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4666">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4667">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4667">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4668">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4668">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4669">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4669">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4670">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4670">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4671">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4672">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4672">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4673">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4673">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4674">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4675">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4676">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4677">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4678">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4679">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4680">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4681">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4682">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4683">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4684">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4685">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4686">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4688">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4688">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4689">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4689">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4690">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4691">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4692">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4693">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4695">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4697">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4699">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4700">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4701">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4715">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4716">此实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4717">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4718">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4719">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4721">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4722">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4722">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4723">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4724">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4726">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4728">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4729">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4730">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4731">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4733">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4734">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4765">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4766">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4767">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4769">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4770">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4771">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4772">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4774">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4776">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4777">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4778">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4779">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4780">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4781">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4782">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4813">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4814">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4815">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4815">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4817">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4818">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4819">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4820">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4821">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4821">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4822">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4823">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4823">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4824">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4825">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4826">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4827">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4827">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4829">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4831">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4832">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4833">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4834">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4835">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4848">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4848">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4849">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4849">taxno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4852">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4852">tin id</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4855">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4856">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4857">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4858">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4859">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4859">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4860">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4861">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4862">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4863">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4865">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4866">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4867">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4868">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4869">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4870">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4871">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4872">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4873">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4874">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4875">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4876">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4877">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4878">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4879">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4880">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4881">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4882">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4895">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4896">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4897">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4898">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4899">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4900">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4901">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4902">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4902">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4903">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4903">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4904">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4904">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4905">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4905">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4906">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4907">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4908">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4909">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-4910">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4911">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4912">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4913">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4914">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4914">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-4915">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4915">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4916">ausstel一sdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4916">ausstellungsdatum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4917">ausstel一sort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4917">ausstellungsort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4918">ausstellende behöde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4918">ausstellende behöde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4919">ausstellende behorde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4919">ausstellende behorde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4920">ausstellende behoerde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4920">ausstellende behoerde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4921">führerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4921">führerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4922">fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4922">fuhrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-4923">fuehrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-4923">fuehrerschein</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5062">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5063">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5064">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5065">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5067">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5068">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5069">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5070">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5071">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5072">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5073">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5074">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5075">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5076">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5077">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5079">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5079">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5080">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5080">ausweis</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5092">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5093">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5094">此实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5095">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5096">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5098">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5099">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5100">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5100">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5101">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5102">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5104">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5106">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5107">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5108">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5109">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5111">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5112">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5113">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5127">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5127">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5136">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5137">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5138">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5140">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5140">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5141">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5141">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5142">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5143">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5143">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5144">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5145">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5146">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5147">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5148">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5148">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5150">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5152">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5153">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5154">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5155">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5156">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
