## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5182">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5183">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5184">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5185">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5186">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5187">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5188">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5189">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5190">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5191">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5192">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5193">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5194">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5195">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5196">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5197">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5198">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5199">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5202">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5204">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5205">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5206">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5207">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5208">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5209">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5209">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5211">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5211">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5212">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5212">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5213">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5213">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5214">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5214">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5215">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5215">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5216">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5216">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5218">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5219">此实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5220">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5221">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5222">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5224">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5224">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5225">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5226">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5226">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5227">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5228">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5229">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5230">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5356">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5357">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5358">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5359">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5360">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5361">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5362">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5362">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5363">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5364">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5365">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5366">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5366">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5367">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5369">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5371">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5372">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5373">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5374">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5375">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5376">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5378">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5379">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5380">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5381">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5382">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5386">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5387">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5388">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5390">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5392">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5394">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5395">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5396">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5397">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5398">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5399">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5400">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5417">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5418">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5419">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5420">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5421">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5422">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5423">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5424">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5425">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5427">六个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5428">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5429">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5429">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5430">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5431">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5431">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5432">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5433">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5434">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5435">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5436">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5437">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5448">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5449">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5450">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5451">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5452">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5453">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5454">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5455">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5456">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5458">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5458">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5460">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5460">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5462">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5463">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5464">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5493">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5494">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5495">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5497">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5498">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5499">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5499">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5500">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5501">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5502">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5503">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5504">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5505">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5506">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5507">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5508">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5509">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5510">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5550">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5551">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5552">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5553">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5554">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5555">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5556">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5556">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5558">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5560">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5561">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5562">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5687">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5687">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5688">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5689">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5690">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5691">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5692">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5693">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5694">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5695">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5695">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5697">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5697">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5698">一个数字，对应性别，1 表示男性，2 表示男性。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5699">对于在 1900 以前生活的人或具有双重公民权的人，也可以申请其他号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5700">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5701">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5702">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5704">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5706">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5707">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5708">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5709">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5710">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5711">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5711">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5713">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5713">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5714">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5714">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5715">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5715">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5719">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5719">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5720">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5721">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5722">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5723">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5725">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5727">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5729">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5730">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5731">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5732">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5734">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5735">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5755">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5756">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5757">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5759">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5761">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5763">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5764">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5765">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5766">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5767">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5787">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5788">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5789">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5790">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5791">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5792">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5793">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5794">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5795">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5797">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5798">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5799">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5800">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5802">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5804">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5805">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5806">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5807">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5808">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5834">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5835">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5836">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5837">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5838">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5839">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5840">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5841">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5842">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5843">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5844">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5845">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5846">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5847">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5848">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5849">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5850">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5851">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5852">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5853">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5854">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5855">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5869">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5870">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5871">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5872">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5873">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5874">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5875">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5876">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5877">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5878">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5879">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5880">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5881">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5882">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5883">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5884">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5885">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5886">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5891">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5892">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5893">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5894">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5895">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5896">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5897">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5898">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5899">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5900">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5901">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5903">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5905">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5906">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5907">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5908">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5910">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5911">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5920">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5921">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5922">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5924">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5925">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5926">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5927">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5928">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5929">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5930">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5931">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5932">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5933">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5934">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5935">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5936">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5937">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5938">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5939">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5941">KTP</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5944">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5945">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5946">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-5947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-5948">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5949">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5950">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5951">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5952">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-p139">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-p139">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5955">ad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5955">ad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5964">ch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5964">ch</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5993">lv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5993">lv</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5994">mc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5994">mc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5995">md</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5995">md</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5996">me</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5996">me</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-5997">mk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-5997">mk</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6000">mu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6000">mu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6001">nl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6001">nl</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6005">ro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6005">ro</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6008">se</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6008">se</span></span>
