### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6015">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6016">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6016">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6017">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6018">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6019">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6020">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6021">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6021">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6022">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6022">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6023">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6023">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6024">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6025">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6025">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6026">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6027">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6027">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6028">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6029">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6030">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6031">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6032">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6032">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6033">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6033">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6034">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6034">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6035">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6035">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6036">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6036">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6037">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6037">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6038">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6038">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6039">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6039">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6040">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6040">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6041">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6041">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6042">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6042">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6043">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6043">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6044">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6044">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6045">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6045">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6046">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6047">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6047">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6048">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6049">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6050">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6050">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6051">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6051">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6052">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6052">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6053">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6053">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6054">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6054">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6055">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6055">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6056">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6056">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6057">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6057">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6058">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6058">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6059">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6059">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6060">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6060">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6061">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6061">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6062">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6062">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6063">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6063">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6064">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6064">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6065">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6066">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6067">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6068">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6069">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6069">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6070">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6070">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6071">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6071">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6072">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6072">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6073">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6073">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6074">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6074">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6075">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6075">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6076">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6076">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6077">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6077">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6078">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6078">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6079">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6080">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6080">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6081">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6081">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6082">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6082">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6083">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6083">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6084">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6085">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6085">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6086">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6087">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6087">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6089">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6089">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6090">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6090">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6091">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6091">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6093">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6093">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6095">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6095">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6096">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6096">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6097">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6097">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6221">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6221">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6222">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6223">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6223">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6225">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6225">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6226">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6226">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6227">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6227">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6229">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6231">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6231">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6232">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6232">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6233">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6233">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6234">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6234">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6235">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6235">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6236">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6236">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6237">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6237">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6261">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6261">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6262">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6263">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6263">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6264">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6264">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6265">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6265">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6266">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6266">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6268">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6268">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6269">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6269">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6270">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6270">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6271">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6271">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6272">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6272">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6273">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6273">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6274">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6274">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6276">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6278">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6278">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6279">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6279">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6280">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6280">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6281">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6282">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6283">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6283">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6284">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6284">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6329">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6329">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6330">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6331">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6331">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6332">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6333">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6333">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6334">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6335">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6335">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6336">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6336">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6337">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6337">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6338">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6338">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6339">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6339">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6340">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6340">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6342">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6345">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6345">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6346">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6346">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6347">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6347">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6348">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6353">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6353">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6354">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6355">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6356">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6357">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6357">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6358">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6359">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6359">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6360">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6361">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6362">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6362">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6363">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6363">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6364">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6364">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6383">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6383">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6384">此类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6384">This type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6385">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6385">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6386">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6387">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6387">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6389">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6389">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6390">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6390">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6391">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6391">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6392">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6392">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6393">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6393">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6395">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6397">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6398">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6398">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6399">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6399">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6526">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6526">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6527">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6527">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6528">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6528">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6529">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6529">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6530">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6530">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6531">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6531">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6532">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6532">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6533">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6533">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6534">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6534">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6535">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6535">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6536">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6536">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6537">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6537">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6538">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6538">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6539">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6539">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6540">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6540">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6541">为区分性别，与当月中的一天对应的两个数字，40 个数字将添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6541">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6542">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6542">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6543">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6543">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6545">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6547">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6547">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6548">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6548">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6549">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6549">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6550">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6550">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6551">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6551">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6586">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6586">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6587">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6588">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6588">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6589">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6590">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6590">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6591">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6591">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6592">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6592">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6593">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6593">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6594">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6594">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6595">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6595">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6596">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6596">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6597">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6597">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6598">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6598">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6599">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6599">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6600">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6601">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6601">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6602">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6626">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6626">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6627">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6627">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6628">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6628">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6629">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6629">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6630">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6630">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6631">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6631">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6632">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6632">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6633">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6634">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6634">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6635">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6636">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6636">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6637">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6637">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6638">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6638">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6639">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6639">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6640">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6640">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6641">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6641">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6642">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6642">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6643">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6643">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6644">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6644">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6645">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6645">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6646">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6646">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6647">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6647">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6648">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6648">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6656">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6656">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6657">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6658">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6658">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6660">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6660">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6661">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6661">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6662">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6662">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6663">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6663">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6664">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6664">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6665">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6665">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6666">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6667">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6667">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6668">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6669">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6669">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6670">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6670">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6671">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6671">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6672">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6672">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6673">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6673">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6674">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6675">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6676">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6676">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6677">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6677">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6724">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6724">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6725">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6726">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6726">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6727">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6728">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6728">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6729">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6730">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6730">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6731">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6732">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6733">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6733">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6734">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6734">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6772">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6772">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6773">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6773">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6774">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6774">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6775">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6775">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6776">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6776">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6777">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6777">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6778">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6778">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6779">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6780">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6780">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6782">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6782">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6783">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6783">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6784">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6784">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6785">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6786">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6786">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6787">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6788">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6788">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6789">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6789">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6790">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6790">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6791">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6792">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6792">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6805">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6805">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6806">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6807">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6808">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6809">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6810">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6811">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6812">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6813">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6813">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6815">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6815">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6816">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6816">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6817">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6817">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6818">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6818">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6819">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6819">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6820">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6820">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6821">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6822">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6822">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6823">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6824">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6825">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6825">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6826">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6826">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6827">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6827">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6828">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6828">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6841">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6841">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6842">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6843">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6843">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6844">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6845">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6845">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6846">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6847">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6848">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6849">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6850">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6850">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6851">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6851">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6856">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6856">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6857">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6857">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6858">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6858">パスポート</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6861">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6861">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6862">パスポート#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6862">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6863">パスポパスポパスポ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6863">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6864">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6864">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6865">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6865">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6866">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6866">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6867">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6867">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6868">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6869">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6870">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6871">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6872">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6873">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6873">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6874">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6874">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6875">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6875">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6877">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6879">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6880">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6881">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6882">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6884">居住地卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6885">居住卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6886">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6887">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6888">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6888">在留カード</span></span>
