## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6890">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6890">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6891">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6892">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6892">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6893">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6893">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6894">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6894">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6895">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6895">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6896">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6896">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6897">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6897">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6898">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6898">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6899">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6899">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6900">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6900">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6901">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6901">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6902">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6903">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6903">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6904">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6905">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6905">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6906">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6906">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6907">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6908">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6909">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6910">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6910">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6911">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6911">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6912">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6912">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6913">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6914">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6915">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6917">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6918">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6918">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6919">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6920">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6921">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6922">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6923">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6924">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6925">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6926">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6927">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6928">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6929">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6930">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6951">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6952">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6953">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6955">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6956">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6957">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6957">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6958">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6959">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-6960">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-6961">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6962">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-6963">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7088">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7089">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7090">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7091">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7092">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7093">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7094">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7095">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7096">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7097">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7098">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7099">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7100">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7101">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7101">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7102">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7103">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7103">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7104">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7105">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7106">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7107">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7108">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7109">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7172">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7173">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7174">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7176">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7177">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7178">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7178">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7179">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7180">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7180">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7181">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7182">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7183">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7184">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7185">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7187">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7188">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7211">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7212">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7213">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7214">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7215">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7215">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7216">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7217">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7217">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7218">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7219">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7220">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7221">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7346">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7347">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7348">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7349">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7350">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7351">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7352">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7353">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7354">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7355">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7356">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7357">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7358">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7359">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7360">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7360">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7361">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7362">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7362">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7363">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7364">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7365">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7366">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7367">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7368">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7403">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7404">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7405">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7407">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7408">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7409">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7409">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7410">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7411">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7412">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7413">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7414">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7415">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7416">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7417">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7418">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7418">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7419">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7419">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7420">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7420">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7437">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7438">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7439">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7440">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7441">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7441">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7442">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7443">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7444">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7445">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7446">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7447">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7571"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7572">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7573">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7574">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7575">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7576">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7577">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7578">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7579">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7580">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7581">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7581">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7582">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7582">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7583">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7583">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7585">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7585">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7587">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7588">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7589">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7590">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7591">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7614">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7615">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7616">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7617">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7618">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7619">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7620">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7620">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7621">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7622">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7623">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7624">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7625">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7626">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7627">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7628">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7660">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7661">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7662">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7662">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7664">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7664">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7665">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7666">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7666">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7667">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7668">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7669">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7670">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7671">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7672">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7672">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7674">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7674">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7676">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7677">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7678">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7679">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7680">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7720">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7721">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7722">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7724">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7725">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7726">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7727">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7728">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7729">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7729">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7730">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7732">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7734">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7735">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7736">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7763">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7764">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7765">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7767">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7768">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7769">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7770">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7771">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7772">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7772">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7774">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7774">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7776">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7777">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7778">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7899">Keywords_malta_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7899">Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7900">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7900">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7901">liċenzji tas-sewwieq</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7901">liċenzji tas-sewwieq</span></span>


## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7902">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7903">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7904">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7905">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7906">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7907">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7908">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7909">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7910">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7912">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7913">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7913">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7914">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7915">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7916">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7916">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7917">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7918">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7919">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7920">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7921">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7922">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7923">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7923">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7939">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7940">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7941">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7942">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7943">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7943">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7945">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7947">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7948">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7949">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7950">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7951">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7952">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7953">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7973">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7974">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7975">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7976">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7977">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7978">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7978">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7980">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7981">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7981">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7982">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7983">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7984">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7985">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7986">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7986">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-7987">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7988">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7989">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7990">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-7991">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-7992">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8025">一个 MBI (的) 标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8026">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8027">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8029">1 到 9 之间的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8030">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8031">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8032">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8033">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8034">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8035">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8036">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8037">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8038">两个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8039">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8039">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8040">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8041">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8041">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8042">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8043">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8044">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8045">找到 的  `Keyword_mbi_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8046">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8047">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8048">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8050">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8051">mbi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8051">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8052">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8052">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8053">一个优势标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8053">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8054">一名受益者否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8054">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8055">一名收入者编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8055">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8056">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8056">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8057">墨西哥唯一总体注册表代码 (CURP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8058">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8059">18 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8060">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8061">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8062">六个数字，表示有效日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8063">字母 - H/h 或 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8064">指示有效"墨西哥"状态代码的两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8065">三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8066">一个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8067">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8067">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8068">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8069">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8069">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8070">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8071">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8072">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8073">找到 的  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8074">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8075">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8082">CURP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8082">CURP</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8084">唯一 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8084">Unique ID</span></span>
