## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8096">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8097">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8098">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8100">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8101">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8101">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8102">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8102">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8103">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8103">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8104">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8104">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8105">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8107">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8109">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8110">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8111">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8112">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8130">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8130">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8131">uniek identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8131">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8136">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8137">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8138">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8140">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8140">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8142">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8142">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8144">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8145">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8146">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8275">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8275">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8277">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8278">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8280">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8280">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8283">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8284">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8285">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8286">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8287">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8288">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8306">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8307">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8308">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8309">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8310">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8311">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8312">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8313">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8314">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8316">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8316">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8317">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8318">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8319">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8320">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8321">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8322">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8323">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8324">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8362">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8363">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8364">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8365">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8366">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8367">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8368">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8369">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8370">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8372">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8373">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8374">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8375">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8376">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8377">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8378">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8379">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8381">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8384">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8385">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8386">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8387">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8388">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8388">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8396">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8397">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8398">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8399">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8400">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8401">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8402">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8403">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8404">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8405">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8406">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8407">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8408">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8409">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8410">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8411">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8412">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8413">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8414">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8416">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8418">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8419">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8420">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8421">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8422">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8430">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8431">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8432">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8433">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8434">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8435">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8436">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8437">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8438">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8440">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8441">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8441">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8442">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8444">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8446">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8447">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8448">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8449">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8450">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8517">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8518">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8518">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8519">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8519">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8520">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8520">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8521">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8521">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8522">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8522">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8523">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8523">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8524">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8525">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8527">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8528">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8529">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8531">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8533">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8534">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8535">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8536">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8537">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8538">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8539">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8540">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8541">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8541">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8542">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8543">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8543">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8544">ird 否#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8544">ird no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8546">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8546">new zealand ird</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8549">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8550">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8551">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8553">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8554">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8554">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8555">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8556">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8557">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8558">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8559">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8560">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8561">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8562">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8563">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8564">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8565">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8579">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8580">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8581">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8582">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8583">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8584">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8585">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8586">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8587">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8589">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8590">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8591">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8592">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8593">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8594">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8596">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8598">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8599">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8600">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8601">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8602">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8603">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8603">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8604">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8607">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8607">social welfare No.</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8610">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8611">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8612">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8613">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8614">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8615">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8616">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8617">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8618">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8619">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8620">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8621">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8622">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8623">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8624">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8625">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8626">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8627">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8636">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8637">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8638">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8639">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8640">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8641">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8641">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8642">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8642">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8643">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8644">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8644">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8645">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8647">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8649">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8650">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8651">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8652">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8652">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8655">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8656">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8656">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8658">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8659">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8660">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8661">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8662">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8663">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8663">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8664">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8665">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8666">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8667">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8667">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8669">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8671">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8672">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8673">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8797">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8798">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8799">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8800">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8801">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8802">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8803">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8804">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8805">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8806">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8807">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8808">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8809">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8811">）Osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8811">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-p145">dow. os.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-p145">dow. os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8819">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8820">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8821">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8822">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8823">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8824">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8825">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8826">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8827">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8828">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8829">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8830">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8831">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8832">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8833">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8834">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8835">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8836">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8836">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8838">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8838">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8839">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8839">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8842">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8842">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8843">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8843">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8846">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8846">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8847">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8848">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8849">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8850">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8851">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8852">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8853">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8855">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8857">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8858">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8859">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8860">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8861">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8862">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8863">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8864">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8865">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8866">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8867">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8868">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8894">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8895">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8896">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8897">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8898">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8899">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8900">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8901">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8902">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8903">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8904">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8905">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8905">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8906">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8907">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8908">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8910">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8913">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8914">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8915">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8916">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8933">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8934">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8935">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8936">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8937">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8938">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8939">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8940">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8941">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8942">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8943">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8943">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8945">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8945">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8947">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8948">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8949">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8979">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8980">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8981">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8982">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8983">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8984">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8985">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-8986">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-8987">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8988">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-8989">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
