## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9009">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9010">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9011">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9012">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9013">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9014">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9015">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9016">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9017">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9018">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9019">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9020">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9021">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9022">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9023">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9024">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9024">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9026">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9028">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9029">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9030">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9162">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9163">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9164">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9166">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9167">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9168">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9169">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9170">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9171">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9172">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9173">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9174">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9175">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9176">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9177">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9178">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9205">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9206">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9207">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9209">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9210">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9211">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9212">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9213">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9213">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9215">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9215">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9217">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9218">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9219">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9220">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9221">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9222">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9222">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9223">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9223">Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9224">cpf#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9224">cpf#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9225">cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9225">cpf</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9246">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9247">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9248">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9249">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9250">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9251">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9252">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9252">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9253">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9254">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9254">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9255">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9256">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9257">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9258">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9386">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9387">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9388">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9389">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9390">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9391">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9392">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9393">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9394">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9396">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9397">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9398">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9399">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9401">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9403">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9404">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9405">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9406">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9407">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9458">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9459">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9460">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9461">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9462">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9464">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9466">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9467">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9468">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9469">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9470">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9471">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9472">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9473">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9473">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9475">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9475">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9477">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9477">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9478">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9478">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9479">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9479">passportno</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9490">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9490">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9491">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9492">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9493">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9493">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9494">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9494">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9495">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9495">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9496">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9496">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9497">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9498">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9499">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9500">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9501">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9502">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9503">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9504">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9504">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9505">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9505">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9506">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9507">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9508">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9509">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9510">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9511">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9528">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9529">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9529">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9530">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9530">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9531">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9532">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9532">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9533">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9533">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9534">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9535">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9536">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9537">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9538">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9538">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9539">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9539">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9540">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9540">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9541">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9541">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9542">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9543">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9544">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9545">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9546">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9547">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9564">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9565">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9566">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9568">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9570">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9572">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9573">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9574">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9575">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9575">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9576">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9577">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9577">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9578">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9578">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9579">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9579">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9581">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9582">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9583">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9584">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9585">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9586">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9587">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9587">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9588">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9589">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9590">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9591">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9592">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9593">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9594">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9595">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9596">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9597">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9598">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9599">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9599">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9600">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9600">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9601">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9601">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9602">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9602">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9603">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9603">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9604">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9604">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9605">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9605">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9606">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9606">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9607">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9607">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9608">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9608">身份證</span></span> 

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9609">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9610">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9611">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9613">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9614">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9615">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9615">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9616">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9617">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9618">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9619">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9620">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9621">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9747">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9748">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9749">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9750">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9751">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9752">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9753">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9754">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9755">九个或 10 个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9757">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9758">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9759">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9760">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9762">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9764">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9765">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9766">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9767">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9768">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9815">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9816">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9817">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9819">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9821">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9823">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9824">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9825">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9826">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9827">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9828">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9829">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9851">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9852">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9853">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9854">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9855">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9855">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9856">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9857">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9857">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9858">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9859">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9860">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9861">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9988">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9989">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9990">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9991">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9992">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9993">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9994">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9995">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9996">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-9997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-9998">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-9999">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10000">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10001">三个数字，对应于同一天的人的性别和序列号的组合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10002">000-499（男性）和 500-999（针对男性）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10003">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10003">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10005">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10005">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10007">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10008">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10009">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10010">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10011">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10039">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10040">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10041">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10042">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10043">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10044">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10045">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10046">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10046">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10048">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10048">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10050">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10051">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10052">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10053">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10054">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10055">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10056">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10079">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10080">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10081">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10082">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10083">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10084">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10085">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10086">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10087">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10088">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10089">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10090">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10091">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10091">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10092">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10093">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10094">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10095">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10096">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10097">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10098">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10099">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
