## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10123">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10124">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10125">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10126">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10127">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10128">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10129">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10129">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10130">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10131">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10132">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10134">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10136">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10137">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10138">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10139">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10140">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10140">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10141">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10142">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10142">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10143">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10143">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10144">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10144">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10145">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10146">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10147">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10149">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10150">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10151">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10151">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10152">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10153">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10154">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10155">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10157">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10159">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10160">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10161">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10162">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10163">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10164">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10165">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10166">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10166">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10168">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10168">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10171">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10171">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10172">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10172">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10173">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10174">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10175">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10176">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10177">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10178">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10178">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10179">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10181">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10183">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10184">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10185">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10187">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10188">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10188">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10332">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10333">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10334">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10335">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10336">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10337">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10338">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10339">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10340">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10341">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10342">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10366">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10367">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10368">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10370">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10371">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10371">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10372">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10373">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10373">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10375">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10375">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10377">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10378">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10379">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10380">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10381">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10382">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10383">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10397">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10397">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10412">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10413">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10414">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10416">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10417">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10417">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10418">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10419">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10420">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10421">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10422">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10423">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10424">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10425">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10426">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10427">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10428">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10429">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10430">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10431">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10432">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10432">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10433">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10434">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10435">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10435">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10436">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10436">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10437">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10437">social security no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10439">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10439">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10440">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10441">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10442">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10443">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10444">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10445">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10446">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10447">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10448">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10450">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10451">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10451">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10452">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10453">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10454">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10455">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10456">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10457">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10458">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10459">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10460">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10461">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10462">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10463">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10464">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10465">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10466">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10467">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10468">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10469">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10470">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10471">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10472">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10473">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10474">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10475">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10476">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10507">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10508">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10509">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10511">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10512">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10513">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10514">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10515">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10516">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10517">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10518">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10519">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10520">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10521">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10522">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10523">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10524">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10525">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10526">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10526">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10527">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10528">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10528">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10529">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10529">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10530">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10530">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10531">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10531">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10532">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10533">此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10533">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10534">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和一个星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10534">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10535">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10535">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10536">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10536">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10537">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10537">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10538">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10538">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10539">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10540">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10541">此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10541">This sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10542">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10542">contoso</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10553">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10554">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10555">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10557">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10558">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10558">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10559">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10560">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10560">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10562">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10565">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10566">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10699">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10700">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10701">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10702">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10703">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10704">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10705">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10706">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10707">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10709">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10712">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10713">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10714">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10715">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10716">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10717">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10736">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10737">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10738">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10740">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10742">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10744">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10745">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10746">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10747">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10749">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10750">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10786">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10787">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10788">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10789">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10790">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10791">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10792">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10793">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10794">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10795">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10796">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10797">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10798">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10799">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10800">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10801">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10802">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10804">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10806">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10807">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10808">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10809">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10810">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10836">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10837">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10838">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10840">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10841">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10842">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10843">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10844">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10845">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10846">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10847">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10848">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10849">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10850">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10851">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10888">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10889">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10890">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10891">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10892">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10893">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10894">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10895">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10896">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10898">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10899">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10900">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10901">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10902">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10903">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10904">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10905">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10907">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10909">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10910">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10911">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10912">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10913">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10934">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10935">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10936">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10938">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10939">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10940">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10941">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10942">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10943">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10944">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10945">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10946">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10947">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10948">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10949">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10950">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10951">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10968">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10969">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10970">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10971">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10972">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10973">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10974">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10975">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10976">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10977">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10979">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10982">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10983">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10988">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10988">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10989">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10989">Passport Num</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10991">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10992">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10992">中華民國護照</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10994">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10995">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10996">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-10997">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-10998">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-10999">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11000">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11001">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11002">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11003">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11004">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11005">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11006">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11020">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11021">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11022">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11024">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11025">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11026">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11027">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11028">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11029">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11030">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11031">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11032">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11033">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11034">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
