- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11043">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11044">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11045">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11047">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11048">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11049">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11050">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11051">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11052">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11053">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11054">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11055">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11056">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11062">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11063">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11064">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11065">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11066">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11067">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11068">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11069">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11070">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11071">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11072">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11073">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11074">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11075">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11076">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11077">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11078">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11079">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11080">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11081">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11082">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11083">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11204">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11205">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11206">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11207">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11208">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11209">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11210">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11211">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11212">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11213">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11214">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11215">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11216">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11218">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11218">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11219">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11220">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11221">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11222">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11224">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11225">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11226">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11227">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11228">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11229">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11229">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11230">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11231">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11231">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11232">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11234">支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11236">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11237">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11238">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11239">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11240">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11241">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11242">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11243">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11243">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11245">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11245">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11246">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11246">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11247">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11247">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11248">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11248">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11249">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11249">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11250">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11250">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11251">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11251">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11252">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11252">patient no</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11255">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11255">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11256">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11256">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11257">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11257">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11258">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11258">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11259">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11259">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11260">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11261">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11262">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11263">它还作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11264">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11265">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11267">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11268">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11269">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11270">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11271">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11272">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11273">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11274">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11275">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11276">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11277">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11278">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11279">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11280">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11282">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11284">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11285">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11286">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11287">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11288">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11310">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11311">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11312">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11313">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11314">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11315">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11316">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11317">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11318">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11319">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11321">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11321">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11323">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11325">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11326">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11327">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11347">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11348">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11349">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11350">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11351">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11353">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11355">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11356">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11357">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11387">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11388">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11389">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11390">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11391">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11392">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11393">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11395">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11397">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11398">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11399">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11400">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11401">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11402">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11403">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11404">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11405">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11503">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11504">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11505">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11506">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11507">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11508">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11508">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11509">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11509">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11510">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11510">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11511">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11512">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11512">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11513">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11513">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11514">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11515">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11516">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11516">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11517">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11517">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11518">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11519">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11521">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11523">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11524">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11525">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11526">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11527">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11528">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11529">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11530">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11545">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11546">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11547">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11548">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11549">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11550">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11551">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11555">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11556">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11557">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11558">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11559">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11560">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11561">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11562">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11563">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11565">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11566">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11567">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11568">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11569">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11570">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11570">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11571">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11571">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11574">social security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11574">social security #</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11584">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11586">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11587">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11589">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11590">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11591">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11592">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11593">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11594">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11595">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11596">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11597">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11598">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11599">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11600">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11600">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11601">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11601">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11608">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11608">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11609">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11609">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11615">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11616">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11617">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11618">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11619">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11619">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11620">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11620">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11622">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11623">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11624">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11625">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11627">不支持</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="753ae-11628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="753ae-11629">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11630">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="753ae-11631">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="753ae-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
